entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then a few showers beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
